_sText:
Surf_Elixor.
By [F]o[X]

Timelimit: 5 minutes.

1 Jail.

32 player spawn.

First off, I'd just like to acknowledge some of the people who helped make this map possible.

DarkGenesis-aka [izzle], dude you were a great help, you pushed me on, and I am glad i had your support. 

Miggo13, for the best video i could ask for in my map. Great man, that video is going to help populate the map so quickly.

Krusty: you helped me find a lot of the bugs and fix 90% of them thanks man.

Video By Miggo13, thanks man! 
__.-=Watch in HQ!!!=-.__
__.-=Watch in HQ!!!=-.__
__.-=Watch in HQ!!!=-.__
 
<object width="480" height="385"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/UmQUAx58t00&hl=en&fs=1"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/UmQUAx58t00&hl=en&fs=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="480" height="385"></embed></object>

-Here are some things you need to know even before downloading-

1. There are a few bugs. 1 of them you might get a weapon in spawn, but that is unfixable. (as far as i know = O)

Something that i thought cool, and this is NOT a bug, is when you flash your flashlight, on a couple stages, the walls will
change colors =  D

I hope you can enjoy the map, I put a lot of work into it, about 3 months.

This is my first map, and it is very obvious. If you compare it to other maps that are out there, even I'd give myself
a 5/10, but just rate the map and treat it like you KNOW it's my first surf map. 

Compile time: 23 minutes, without HDR.

I know that the stages are EXTREMELY small, but I think of it as a different style. Who made it a law that it has to be huge?
Who said the ramps have to be bigger than the person themselves? Don't lower your rating from that please = )

Well, Enjoy!


EDIT: In case you don't realize this, I have already talked to nikki and sangre and they both agree that I did not take any work. Although i made it as exact as possible, i did not copy paste. Last time i got like vmer or vmef or something like that can't remember what it's called, i got a trojan, therefore i don't download that stuff anymore. If you lowered your rating on this, please re-assess because I didn't copy from surf_2012.

[F]o[X]
